name: New Generation Technologies, LLC
tag_list: security-system, alarm-monitoring, access-control, home-theater, home-automation, tv-installations
overview:
New Generation Technologies, LLC is a Houston -based company that has established itself as a full-service security alarm, 24 hour monitoring, access control, cctv / surveillance system and whole-home technology company(including Home Theater and TV Installations). We also provided advanced wiring and systems to premier home and commercial builders.

We have high standards in our customer service and work quality and for those reasons we are able to consistently deliver exceptional results for our diverse client base, which ranges from home owners to small and large businesses.
